name: Cobra masters
description:
A classic snake game like the ones you can play on old flip phones. To control the cursor in the main menu, use the up and down arrows or the WASD keys. To select the item you want, press the Space key.

To control the snake in the game, use the arrows on the keyboard or the WASD keys. The goal of the game is to collect as much food as possible, thereby increasing the length of the snake and scoring more points. Beware of the walls and also your tail, so as not to lose.

On the phone, the controls are buttons that mimic the gamepad.
